TEXT.TITLE: SWISS MORTGAGE INSTITUTE ISSUES 160 MLN SFR BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Swiss Mortgage Institute (Schweizerischer Hypothekarinstitute) is issuing a 160 mln Swiss franc five pct 12-year bond priced at 100.5 pct, lead manager Credit Suisse said. Subscriptions run until Oct. 29. Reuter
